item.title: More efficient?
item.dc:creator: @Sephiroth1 Sephiroth~
item.description:
@Sephiroth1 wrote:

PROBLEM: Which would be more efficient?

else if(itemUsed == 249 && useWith == 227) { deleteItem(249, getItemSlot(249), 1); deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1); sendMessage("You add a guam leaf to the vail of water"); addSkillXP(120, 15); addItem(91, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 227 && useWith == 249) { deleteItem(249, getItemSlot(249), 1); deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1); sendMessage("You add a guam leaf to the vail of water"); addSkillXP(120, 15); addItem(91, 1); }
or

else if(itemUsed == 249 && useWith == 227 || itemUsed == 227 && useWith == 249) { deleteItem(249, getItemSlot(249), 1); deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1); sendMessage("You add a guam leaf to the vail of water"); addSkillXP(120, 15); addItem(91, 1); }

or would they be both the same? i’m going to use LOTS of them, which format would make the server lag more or would they both make the server lag the same amount?

BASE: Project 16V4.5
